description:
Our heroes accompany Ting a Ling (No-How`s sister) to Guatemala in search of her husband, famous explorer Sir Quentin Quest, who has been kidnapped by Ratco. The Bad Rats have also bribed the local Indians into logging the mahogany trees in the jungle. The deforestation is threatening the habitat of the native Quetzal. Sir Quentin and his wife uncover the ancient legend of Quetzcoatl, and help our heroes turn the Indians against the Rats and stop the destruction.
Source: bcdb.com
